entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
